sections.text:
Any person who refuses to comply upon demand with the requirements of this chapter and Chapters 52 (ยง 3.2-5200 et seq.) and 54 (ยง 3.2-5400 et seq.) who shall impede, obstruct, hinder, or otherwise prevent or attempt to prevent any inspector or other person in the performance of his duty in connection with such chapters, is guilty of a Class 2 misdemeanor, unless otherwise specified, and such fines, less the legal costs, shall be paid into the state treasury.

Code 1950, ยง 3-339; 1966, c. 702, ยง 3.1-418; 2002, c. 185; 2008, c. 860.
